name: Blancspot Media
tag_list: games, entertainment, news, activity-sharing, media-platform, social-shopping, social-news, social-gaming, social-network-for-kids
overview:
Blancspot is an award winning activity sharing platform for publishing, extending, monetizing and virtualizing media brands.

The platform comprises a full suite of workflow and development tools from content ingest to distribution, syndication, rights exploitation and business rules application.

The Blancspot technology platform has a functional set of APIs enabling publishers and distributors to integrate with existing digital solutions such as data harvesters, analytics packages, e-commerce and geo-location vendors, in addition to PCI solutions.

iPhone and iPod Touch Concept • Ranked #4 w/in 15 hours of launch– featured in New and Noteworthy • App of the week world wide, Ranked #2 in US, #5 in 14 countries. Awarded “Top Trends 2010 on Apple Platform”

Blancspot for iPad
• #1 position in New and Noteworthy • Ranked top 5 in 26 Countries • Nominated “Startup of the Year” by Business Insider 2011

Blancspot on Android Devices

• Featured on Verizon VCast app store, Verizon Top Developer program. Selected for interactive wall and pre loading on devices across 4000 retail outlets • Featured on Google TV site and Google Play

SOLVING FOR DIGITAL BRANDS: The world is screen deep with rapidly evolving consumer preferences and tastes. The biggest component to managing a brand’s digital presence and therefore long-term financial growth is diversification, as exhibited by the growing number of access points to content.

The Blancspot platform effectively blends technology and content publishing with solutions integration, rights management and customer relationship channels.

The Blancspot Media platform is an entertainment platform that converts media audiences into buying audiences. Blancspot is forming a distribution network including broad reach partners and niche communities to enable a broad range of targeting capabilities. Our focused, clutter-free, socially rich app provides an optimal user experience while ensuring our brands are center stage. From standard packages to unique and innovative Branded Channels, Blancspot offers a wide variety of powerful media monetization opportunities across internet connected devices.
